com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software.drafts.software

Interface Components

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, ComponentsTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentsStub

    public interface Components
extends Service, ComponentsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Components interface provides methods to manage component specification in a software draft.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Components.DeleteInvocation delete(java.lang.String cluster, java.lang.String draft, java.lang.String component)
      Deletes the given component from the software draft.
      Components.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String cluster, java.lang.String draft, java.lang.String component)
      Returns the component version for the given component in the software draft.
      Components.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String cluster, java.lang.String draft)

      Components.UpdateInvocation update(java.lang.String cluster, java.lang.String draft, ComponentsTypes.UpdateSpec spec)
      Updates the list of components in a given draft.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Components.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String cluster,
                             java.lang.String draft,
                             java.lang.String component)
        Returns the component version for the given component in the software draft.

        Invocation Result:
        Information about component version. If null then version will be chosen based on the constraints in the system.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        component - Identifier of the component. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.component.
        Returns:
        instance of Components.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft or no component associated with component in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.

      • set

        Components.SetInvocation set(java.lang.String cluster,
                             java.lang.String draft,
                             java.lang.String component)
        Set the component version for a given component in the software draft. This will overwrite any existing version for the given component.
        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        component - Identifier of the component. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.component.
        Returns:
        instance of Components.SetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described set operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

      • delete

        Components.DeleteInvocation delete(java.lang.String cluster,
                                   java.lang.String draft,
                                   java.lang.String component)
        Deletes the given component from the software draft.
        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        component - Identifier of the component. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.component.
        Returns:
        instance of Components.DeleteInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described delete operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

      • update

        Components.UpdateInvocation update(java.lang.String cluster,
                                   java.lang.String draft,
                                   ComponentsTypes.UpdateSpec spec)
        Updates the list of components in a given draft. This allows set and/or delete of multiple components in a batch operation.
        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        spec - Update specification containing list of components to add and/or delete.
        Returns:
        instance of Components.UpdateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described update operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is some unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

      • list

        Components.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String cluster,
                               java.lang.String draft)
        Returns the components that comprise the software draft.

        Invocation Result:
        Map of component version information keyed by the component identifier. The key in the return value Map will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.component.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Components.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is some unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
